EdgeOfAbyss.Hope.HopeDef.description: This is the sum of all hope levels of this creature.
EdgeOfAbyss.Hope.HopeDef.flavorText: Ah, yes, hope: an intangible enigma, the manifestation of faith in trying times, often irrational, but undeniably powerful. Intriguing, indeed.
EdgeOfAbyss.Hope.HopeDef.hint: Having low total hope will worsen the mood of this creature.

EdgeOfAbyss.Hope.HopeDef.description: This is the hope level from having enough to eat.
EdgeOfAbyss.Hope.HopeDef.flavorText: Entropy dictates that all must consume to survive, and generously rewards those who follows such truthful advice.
EdgeOfAbyss.Hope.HopeDef.hint: This hope always decreases at a speed dependent on how hungry this creature is. Maintain this hope by feeding this creature decent food.

EdgeOfAbyss.Hope.HopeDef.description: This is the hope level from this creature's mood.
EdgeOfAbyss.Hope.HopeDef.flavorText: Feeling good allows one to view the world in a better light, making them feel even better.
EdgeOfAbyss.Hope.HopeDef.hint: This hope is maintained by having good mood, and is drained by having bad mood.
